definition: Chinese mugwort or wormwood/moxa/to stop or cut short/phonetic "ai" or "i"/abbr. for 艾滋病[ai4 zi1 bing4], AIDS

sentences.english: Along with the extending of time, the contact toxicity of A. wormwood extracts on drosophila increased.
sentences.chinese: 随着时间的延长，艾草提取液对果蝇的触杀效果增强。

sentences.english: Families hung wormwood and calamus on the door for the traditional Double-Fifth Festival in ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 旧时的端午节，家家户户都会在门口挂艾草，插菖蒲。

sentences.english: So far, that a touch of wormwood incense is still my heart the most precious collections.
sentences.chinese: 至今，那淡淡的艾草香仍是我心中最珍贵的藏品。

sentences.english: Every year my family hangs wormwoods on their front door.
sentences.chinese: 艾草每年我的家人都会挂艾草在前门。

sentences.english: Every year my family hangs wormwoods on their front door.
sentences.chinese: 艾草每年我的家人都会挂艾草在前门。

definition: Acorus calamus/sweet sedge or sweet flag
a small bag full of fragrance used on Dragon boat Festival
red root gromwell (Lithospermum erythrorhizon)/flowering plant whose roots provide purple dye/arnebia (plant genus in family Boraginaceae)
